mapper.select: SELECT notice_no noticeNo, employee_id employeeId, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') createDate, update_date updateDate FROM notice ORDER BY notice_no desc LIMIT #{beginRow},#{rowPerPage}

SELECT n.notice_no noticeNo, n.employee_id employeeId, n.notice_title noticeTitle, n.notice_content noticeContent, n.create_date createDate, n.update_date updateDate, nf.noticeFile_no noticeFileNo, nf.file_name fileName FROM notice n JOIN noticefile nf ON n.notice_no = nf.notice_no WHERE n.notice_no=#{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( employee_id, notice_title, notice_content, create_date, update_date ) VALUES( #{employeeId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW(), NOW() )
